# KubeEdge scale 100

`watch -n 2 'echo $(echo -n $(kubectl get pods -n=test1 | grep "Pending" | wc -l) && echo -n "/" && echo $( kubectl get pods -n=test1 | grep "Running" | wc -l)) | ts >> running.log'`
